thread.title: Man seriously assaulted in small Hawke's Bay town of Haumoana
thread.title_full: Man seriously assaulted in small Hawke's Bay town of Haumoana

title: Man seriously assaulted in small Hawke's Bay town of Haumoana
text:
Man seriously assaulted in small Hawke's Bay town of Haumoana Last updated 12:37, February 6 2017 FAIRFAX NZ 
A man has been seriously assaulted in Hawke's Bay. 
Hawke's Bay Police are investigating the assault of a man in the small town of Haumoana, near Hastings. 
The as-yet unidentified man was found unconscious about 7am on Waitangi Day. 
He was taken to Hawke's Bay Hospital in a critical condition. 
Police are carrying out a scene examination near of Domain Rd. 
Anyone with any information about this incident is asked to contact Police on 06 831 0700.
